overview:
Serge Kazakov is the Technology Architect at Ad Knights, where he contributes over 10 years of complex software design and engineering experience to the AdKnights team.

Mr. Kazakov and his company Solvegen are very instrumental in architecting the revolutionary design of the AdKnight platform. Serge holds masters degree in Computer Science in and bachelor degree in Business Economics from Donbass University, Ukraine. He has worked as a lead developer, software architect and team leader on varied problem domains including business processes automation, distributed multi-tier systems. Serge continues to be actively involved in its ongoing evolution and enhancement of AdKnights.
